participant_1.background: i have three children. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i'm a plumber.

participant_2.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i am studying to be a computer programmer.

content.text: Hi, i feeling great? whats about you? i just came from work and swam a lot, i am a swim coach
at my local pool i work as a swim coach, but  i am studying to be a computer programmer
What are u doing?are studying or working?
i will be happay if i talk with you
Ä° am not from here, i m from india, so my family too
my mother is very traditional and she isnt free spirited, that make me angry and mad
whats about you? do u live with your family?
i like death metal ver well, that is my favorite music genre, whats yours?
are u there, u wanna make me happy, if you talk with me..
